BR_text.BRdescription:
The page <denchmark-link:https://google.github.io/using-iree>https://google.github.io/using-iree</denchmark-link>
  which is linked from <denchmark-link:https://google.github.io/iree/get-started>https://google.github.io/iree/get-started</denchmark-link>
  results in a page not found.

comments_0.comment_text:
Whoops! Looks like <denchmark-link:https://github.com/google/iree/blob/gh-pages/docs/get_started/index.md>https://github.com/google/iree/blob/gh-pages/docs/get_started/index.md</denchmark-link>
  uses a dash where it should use an underscore.

comments_1.comment_text: Well, that wasn't enough to fix unfortunately :(

comments_2.comment_text:
We do some funny stuff with underscores and hyphens:
 
 
 
 iree/scripts/prepare_doc_publication.py
 
 
         Lines 175 to 184
       in
       4ca1207
 
 
 
 
 
 
  # Use the default layout for everything. 
 
 
 
  front_matter['layout'] = 'default' 
 
 
 
  # Use the base filename as permanent link. 
 
 
 
  # Replace '_' with '-'. Underscores are not typical in URLs... 
 
 
 
  front_matter['permalink'] = base_name.replace('_', '-') 
 
 
 
  
 
 
 
  # Organize each doc to a section matching its directory structure. 
 
 
 
  if relpath and relpath != '.': 
 
 
 
  hyphen_relpath = relpath.replace('_', '-') 
 
 
 
  front_matter['permalink'] = f'{hyphen_relpath}/{front_matter["permalink"]}' 
 
 
 
 
 
 passing to <denchmark-link:https://github.com/antiagainst>@antiagainst</denchmark-link>
  :P

comments_3.comment_text: oh, yeah, let's make those consistent (no rewriting) - either we rename the files or we allow underscores :)

comments_4.comment_text: :D Let's change the doc files to use hyphens then.

comments_5.comment_text:
I'm actually going to remove the <denchmark-link:https://google.github.io/iree/using-iree/using-colab>https://google.github.io/iree/using-iree/using-colab</denchmark-link>
  page (custom setup is no longer needed to use Colab) and <denchmark-link:https://google.github.io/iree/using-iree>https://google.github.io/iree/using-iree</denchmark-link>
  until other docs are written there. We should still sort out the underscore/hyphen issue though :P
